com.pos.device.config

Class DevConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pos.device.config.DevConfig

  • public class DevConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defined the configurations about the terminal.

    Created by NP-JAY on 2016/9/23.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • writeBootOrShutAnimation

        public static int writeBootOrShutAnimation(java.lang.String srcPath,
                           java.lang.String desPath)
        Update boot or shutdown animation.
        Parameters:
        srcPath - The full path of the source file, such as "/storage/usbotg/bootanimation.zip", "/storage/usbotg/shutdownanimation.zip"
        desPath - The full path of the destination file. Please set the following path: "/persist/media/bootanimation.zip"(boot animation) or "/persist/media/shutdownanimation.zip"(shutdown animation)
        Returns:
        return 0 if success, others if failed.

      • setReservedProperty

        public static boolean setReservedProperty(java.lang.String key,
                          java.lang.String value)
        Set the property that cannot be cleared after restoring factory settings
        Parameters:
        key - Only support KEY_CUSTOMIZED_SN
        Returns:
        return true if success, false if failed.
